name: Geister
description:
It's ghost season!

Enter Lady Evans' castle to exorcise the spirits that wander inside of it, but watch out! Everytime you defeat a ghost it will join your soul making you slower, weaker or even blind!

Are you sure you can get inside and make it out alive? 

CONTROLS:

  • AWSD: Move
  • Arrows: Aim and Shoot
  • Q: Use Potions and heal up!
  • P: Pause Game

POSSESIONS:

When you defeat a monster, it will possess you. This will last until you until another one possesses you!

  • Blindness: you can only see in an small area surrounding you!
  • Total Paralysis: you can barely move, so think twice before defeating that ghost!
  • Dizziness: your movement controls are inverted!
  • Slowness: you'll begin to move really slow, but faster than paralysed!
  • Less Damage: your spells will be weaker!
  • Poison: it will damage you slowly!
